source.title: Model-based influences on humans' choices and striatal prediction errors

confidence_rationale: Shows outcome-linked striatal PE signals integrating model-based structure, consistent with post-commit attributable update channels.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Striatal prediction error signals reflect both model-free and model-based value components tied to choice outcomes.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-060 post-commit channel: outcome-attribution learning signals can be distinguished from pre-commit simulation critique.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Integration of model-based and model-free terms indicates partial blending, so separation should be boundary-conditioned not absolute.
mapping.source_context: Human decision task with fMRI and computational model comparison.

confidence_components.notes: High-quality direct evidence for outcome-tied credit signals with blending caveat.
